meanings: (동물의) fur, hair, coat, (짧고 굵은) bristle, (양털) wool, (새털) feathers

vlive.korean: 약간 오리털 같은 눈? Kind of like a duck fur? 듣기 View video NCT : 런쥔이왔어요!!

vlive.korean: 굉장히 드센 놈한테 박혀있던 털인가 보다~ It must be from a punk who was so fierce... 듣기 View video SF9 : 어머님들
vlive.english: It must be from a punk who was so fierce...

vlive.korean: 고양이 러시안블루 회색 털을 가지고 있는 - 그래요? Russian Blue. A cat breed with gray fur. - Really? 듣기 View video SECHSKIES : [Replay] SECHSKIES - COMEBACK LIVE '젝다방 포 유 (SECHDABANG FOR YOU)'

vlive.korean: 이거 귀엽다! - 이거 귀엽지 않냐? 이거 안에 털 있어! This is cute! - It looks cute right? There is fur! 듣기 View video MAMAMOO : [Special] MOONBYUL's Weird Day Vlog #2
vlive.english: This is cute! - It looks cute right? There is fur!

vlive.korean: 날개! 털! 털, 털 - 진짜요? Wings.. feather. - Really? 듣기 View video GOT7 : [FULL] GOT7 SHOWCASE

examples.korean: It was time for the sheep to be shorn. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 양들의 털을 깎아야 할 때였다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: The moss was soft and furry to the touch. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 이끼는 부드럽고 만져 보면 털 같았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: At clipping time sheep need to be penned. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 털 깎는 철에는 양을 우리 안에 가둬 놓아야 한다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: At clipping time sheep need to be penned. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: This wool comes from goats, not sheep. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 이 모직은 양이 아니라 염소에서 나온[염소 털로 만든] 것이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
